welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dusseldorf, a charming city known for its vibrant arts scene, beautiful riverfront, and lively atmosphere. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
